mapper.select: select * from ${dbmsTableNm} where rownum <= ${rowCnt}
select count(*) from ${dbmsTableNm}

select upper(t1.class_name) as dbms_table_nm , t1.comment as comments , (select count(*) from DB_INDEX_KEY t01, DB_INDEX t02 where t01.class_name = t1.class_name and t01.class_name = t02.class_name and t02.is_primary_key='YES') as pk_cnt , (select count(*) from DB_INDEX t01 where t01.class_name = t1.class_name) as index_cnt from DB_CLASS t1 where t1.is_system_class ='NO' and UPPER(t1.owner_name) = UPPER(#{dbmsId}) order by t1.class_name

select (select schema()) as dbms_database_nm , upper(t1.class_name) as dbms_table_nm , upper(t1.attr_name) as column_name , CASE WHEN t1.data_type = 'STRING' THEN 'VARCHAR' ELSE t1.data_type END as data_type , t1.prec as data_length , t1.prec as data_precision , t1.scale as data_scale , t1.default_value as data_default , t1.is_nullable as nullable , t1.comment as comments from DB_ATTRIBUTE t1, DB_CLASS t2 where t2.is_system_class ='NO' and t2.class_type = 'CLASS' and t1.class_name = t2.class_name and upper(t2.owner_name) = upper(#{dbmsId})
and upper(t1.class_name) = upper(#{dbmsTableNm})
order by t1.class_name, t1.def_order
select count(*) from ${tblNm} where 1 = 1
select count(*) as cnt from ${tblNm} where trim(${colNm}) = '' and ${colNm} is not null
${ruleExprsnValue}

select upper(t1.key_attr_name) as column_name from db_index_key t1 , db_index t2 , db_class t3 where t1.class_name = t2.class_name and t2.class_name = t3.class_name and t2.is_primary_key = 'YES' and t3.is_system_class ='NO' and t3.class_type = 'CLASS' and upper(t1.class_name) = upper(#{tblNm})
